sub_title: Sales Specialist | B2B Sales | Demand Gen | Services
summary:
There is nothing more exhilarating than landing a big fish! Acquiring new customers, just like catching fish, can be a challenge. You have to navigate external and often unpredictable conditions to achieve this consistently. 

10+ years experience, working with globally recognized companies in leading industries by selling them solutions driven services. With a strong emphasis on creating value through building and growing relationships with all stakeholders. 

Industries: Banking / Education / Food / Tourism
/ Government / Mining

Target ranges: $15m+ Per Quarter                                                                                                              

The most satisfying part of my job is the connection with my clients and helping them find the right person or service to fulfill the needs that were crucial to their business.

profile_positions.description:
Building strong relationships with customers and distribution partners are crucial if not the most important aspect of my role, as a trusted advisor to customers on Support and Deployment services for South Africa. Placing strong emphasis on customer needs and experience throughout the sales cycle, ensuring that customer expectations are met with maintaining and exceeding the services revenue targets set by the business.  

-       Trusted advisor on solutions to support customer specific needs.
-       Build strong strategy for both short and long-term opportunities.
-       Recommend creative ways to meet customer needs.
-       Achieve annual sales quota, with emphasis on quarterly achievement.
-	Manage account plays and opportunities in SFDC
-	Pipeline management on Services sales opportunities in South Africa.
-	Comprehensive routine reporting of progress of Services business to senior management.
-	Building relationship with channel partners to up-sell and grow services revenue. 
-	Building relationships with direct customers and becoming a trusted advisor on Dell services.
-	Driving and delivering results and meeting client expectations. 
-	Responsible for training sales teams on new services as well as refresher training.
profile_positions.title: Services Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
-	Responsible for tracking and controlling all Configuration Services sales opportunities in Southern Central Africa Region.
-	Responsible for comprehensive routine reporting of progress to senior management.
-	Responsible for achieving or exceeding required sales targets in my respective region.  
-	Dealing with and resolving customer complaints and concerns.  
-	Responsible for meeting with customers and becoming a trusted adviser on Configuration\Deployment services.
-	Liaising with the Dell factory either verbally or electronically regarding relevant matters.
-	Driving and delivering results and meeting client expectations. 
-	Responsible for accurate and correct data capturing of customers specifications.
-	Detailed planning and implementing of procedures and systems to maximize operating efficiency.
-	Positively communicating and demonstrating the company's Core Values by developing trust and respect among peers and staff, building strong teams and partnerships and driving results.
-	Dealing with and resolving customer complaints and concerns
profile_positions.title: CS Services sales

profile_positions.description:
As the CS Services Specialist I assisted in the smooth translation of customer Configuration Services requirements in the field into volume orders at Dell’s Manufacturing Facility’s, by providing consultative services and technical support to the BU (Business Unit) on technical issues including the technical specification, EMF technical capabilities, and product transitions. Essentially own the technical requirements for each customer project from inception through to project retirement. Attend Road shows throughout the country and SADC region to promote CS services and to give comprehensive presentations of Dell services. Also attended quarterly programs in the United Kingdom. 


•	Liaise with appointed Dell relationship customers in all segments to determine their exact customization needs, including hardware, software and any other needs for their I.T or end-user project requirements. In addition, determine any other data relevant to the logistics of the roll-out including dates for completion, volumes etc. 

•	Liaise directly with European Manufacturing Facility Engineering team, ensuring they have a thorough knowledge of the requirements as laid out by the customer’s specifications. In conjunction with validation.

•	Ascertain cost and lead time for validated projects and communicate to Sales team.

•	Liaise with customer in relation to field issues. Analyze and communicate to quality and work to determine root-cause and fastest possible fix, for minimum impact on project roll-out.

•	Proactively manage all transition requirements for customer projects

•	Travel to customers Sites around the country and SADC to get the scope of work for each project. 

•	Assist Internal and External Sales teams to actively sell Configuration Services to their customers. 

•	Deal directly with partners for projects relating to customer specific requirements.

•	Procuring of 3rd party hardware for customer specific projects.
profile_positions.title: Configuration services specialist
